results.name: Irregular triangular array T read by rows: T(i,0 )= T(i,2i) = 1 for i >= 0; T(i,1) = T(i,2i-1) = floor(i/2) for i >= 1; for even n >= 2, T(i,j) = T(i-1,j-2) + T(i-1,j-1) + T(i-1,j) for j = 2..2i-2, for odd n >= 3, T(i,j) = T(i-1,j-2) + T(i-1,j) for j = 2..2i-2.
comment: T(n, k) = number of strings s(0)..s(n) such that s(0) = 0, s(n) =n-k, |s(i)-s(i-1)| <=1 if i is even, |s(i)-s(i-1)| = 1 if i is odd.
